titleStmt.title: Official letter from Poseidonios to the priests of Tebtunis.
titleStmt.author: Poseidonios.

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: Poseidonios to the priests at Teptunis, greeting and good health. I too am well. Sokonophis and Opis, members of your body, have come down to the city, and intimate to me the hereditary friendship which you have for me of old; so, whatever you may require, do not hesitate to command my services, because of old I revere and worship the temple. Good-bye. The 16th year, Phaophi 9. (Addressed on the verso) From Poseidonios to the priests of Teptunis.

listBibl.bibl: P.Tebt., I.59; Witkowski, Epistulae privatae, no. 61; White, J.L. Light from Ancient Letters, no. 54. See BL v. 2.2, p. 169.
